mapper.select: SELECT USER_UID, USER_ID, NVL(USER_PWD,'') USER_PWD, NVL(USER_PHONE, '') USER_PHONE, NVL(USER_NAME, '') USER_NAME, NVL(USER_NICK, '') USER_NICK, NVL(USER_EMAIL, '') USER_EMAIL, NVL(ADMIN_STATUS, 'N') ADMIN_STATUS, NVL(STATUS, 'N') STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') , ''), NVL(BIZ_NUM, '') BIZ_NUM, NVL(BIZ_NAME, '') BIZ_NAME, NVL(TO_CHAR(BIZ_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') FROM T_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{value}

SELECT USER_UID, USER_ID, NVL(USER_PWD,'') USER_PWD, NVL(USER_PHONE, '') USER_PHONE, NVL(USER_NAME, '') USER_NAME, NVL(USER_NICK, '') USER_NICK, NVL(USER_EMAIL, '') USER_EMAIL, NVL(ADMIN_STATUS, 'N') ADMIN_STATUS, NVL(STATUS, 'N') STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') , ''), NVL(BIZ_NUM, '') BIZ_NUM, NVL(BIZ_NAME, '') BIZ_NAME, NVL(TO_CHAR(BIZ_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') FROM T_USER WHERE USER_UID = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USER (USER_UID, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_PHONE, USER_NAME, USER_NICK, USER_EMAIL, ADMIN_STATUS, STATUS, REG_DATE, BIZ_NUM, BIZ_NAME, BIZ_DATE) VALUES (#{userUID}, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userPhone}, #{userName}, #{userNick}, #{userEmail}, #{adminStatus}, #{status}, SYSDATE, #{bizNum}, #{bizName}, #{bizDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_USER SET USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, USER_PHONE = #{userPhone}, USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_NICK = #{userNick} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USER_FILE ( USER_UID, FILE_NAME, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE, REG_DATE ) VALUES (#{userUID}, #{fileName}, #{fileExt}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE )
